get portal rodent data Import Portal rodent data using portalr functions. Currently returns rodent data formatted appropriately for LDA analysis.

Source: R/data-function_portal.R
get_portal_rodents.Rd
get_portal_rodents(time_or_plots = "plots", treatment = "control",
  type = "Rodents")

Arguments

time_or_plots

select whether to: (1) "time" == get the data for the entire timespan of the experiment, or (2) "plots" == just the time period with consistent treatments
treatment

"control" or "exclosure" treatments
type

type of animals to get: "Rodents" or restrict to "Granivores"

Contents

  • Arguments
